channel.title: Manifest on Ladicle
channel.description: Recent content in Manifest on Ladicle

item.title: k8s helm & helmc - Kubernetes meetup Tokyo #2
item.description: I talked about helm and helmc. Helm is a package manager for Kubernetes, and Helm classic is a previous version of it. Helm will be implemented a lot of useful functions in the future, but it isn’t better than helmc for now. That’s why it’s better to manage manifests with helmc and follow the trend of helm. Links Slide: https://speakerdeck.com/ladicle/kubernetes-helm-and-helmc Event: https://k8sjp.connpass.com/event/33508/
